text: Won ni ahun si yin (lati se iranlowo). Nigba ti iberu (ogun) ba de, o maa ri won ti won yoo maa wo o. Oju won yo si maa yi kiri rakorako (ni ti iberu) bi eni ti o fe daku, sugbon nigba ti iberu (ogun) ba lo, (ti ikogun ba de), won yoo maa fi awon ahon kan tâ€™o mu berebere ba yin soro ni ti sise okanjua si oore naa. Awon wonyen ko gbagbo ni ododo. Nitori naa, Allahu ba awon ise won je. Iyen si n je irorun fun Allahu
